name: Corn And Green Pepper Salad
keywords: corn on the cob, green pepper, red onion, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 8 to 10 ears of corn (enough for about 6 cups fresh corn kernels)
2 tablespoons chopped hot green chilies, optional
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Shuck corn and cook in boiling water 1 minute. Cool corn by running under cold water. Scrape kernels off ears.
Mix kernels with remaining ingredients and serve.
